Odradzam zakupu tej gry, devsi nic nie robią od większości czasu z tą grą, brak balansu, coraz bardziej toksyczne community, więcej bugów (jak naprawią kilka to powstają następne), coraz większe mapy gdzie za bardzo nikomu się nie chce grać a tym bardziej killerom 110%, prowadzenie MMR do casual game ,który i tak nie działa, nerfy dla killerów przez to że survy tak chcą, nagrodą za błędy itp. przez devsów to głupie bloodpointy które nie wynagradzają graczy za to co odwalają. +jeden devsów porównał DBD do Hokeja (CZEKAJ CO XD) 4vs1 jak HOKEJ?!?!?. Niestety jak nic nie zrobią z tą grą to nie będzie fajne jak przedtem

One of the worst games I've ever played, the community is trash and the game itself is too. Most of the perks don't have any usefulness whatsoever, the survivor meta has been the same since the release of the game and the developers take ages to fix anything or to try and balance anything. I can't stress this enough: Don't. Waste. Money. On. This.

I really want to enjoy DBD, and I love the core gameplay, but the systemic matchmaking issues and the pervasive toxicity of the community make it nearly impossible. I'm hanging in there because I believe things can change for the better, but I can't recommend this game to new players until they do. I may update this review later if there's enough positive improvement.

Update: Fuck Behaviour and fuck this game. I'm uninstalling. Worst gaming company and community on planet Earth. I can't wait for this game to die.

Literal garbage. Unplayable. Devs to busy doing fentanyl to fix broken balancing. Runs like a toaster in a bathtub. Servers made of pasta.

Worst servers imaginable. Had multiple matches where multiple people state they can't even WALK becuase it resets to position 5 seconds ago. Player base is toxic, and if you don't find a toxic player then they are someone who doesn't even know that M1 is how to repair a gen or hit. Nearly no inbetween. Ever since crossplatform was introduced it has increased every issue tenfold, to the point it is literally shrinking the community, every patch they add more updates and issue and bugs, but seem to patch issues no one has ever heard about or cares about. Oh, one blade of grass was a milimeter off shade #09375 green? Thank god, now I can get back to enjoying getting killer stuns and still being hurt half a second later! Can't wait to find a floating bird somewhere, while enjoying my daily turn of blatant connection issus that allow the killer to hit from miles away through solid matter.
Fun game: a tense PvP stealth game from the survivor side, and a frantic hunt from the killer side.

Te engancha mas de los que podes llegar a esperar y si bien tengo cosas negativas que decir como que el balance entre killers y survivors es muy estúpido. jugando killer te obligan a base de insultos a jugar con reglas imaginarias no marcadas en ningún lado dentro del juego ya que al terminar la partida nunca recibís un "GG" solo insultos por no jugar como los survivors quieren que juegues, y tampoco es que haya opciones mejores para los killers, ya que si no matas a alguien rápido lo mejor es olvidarse de ganar la partida. los bugs son molestos, falta comunicación para los supervivientes que no juegan en pre-made, los emparejamientos están rotos. Y aun con todas sus cosas negativas que me pueden hacer decir que es "un juego de mierda" me tiene muy viciado y no parece que me vaya a aburrir en mucho tiempo
a nao cara assim muito bom o jogo tipo ele te mata serio concerteza melhor que fortnite e que xvideos que sao os jogo q eu passo o dia inteiro

I like this game because it is very good. I feel the rush when the killer is chasing me, or when I hook all 4 survivors. There is an aspect to this game that is very arcade like while simultanously, making you feel skillful when you make a big brain juke. 10/10 would recommend.
This game will give you an addiction and then slowly tear you apart from the inside
